name: IIM Ahmedabad
description: IIMA quickly assumed leadership in management education in India and has maintained it ever since. It has grown into India's favorite management school. The benchmark in management education in the country, it attracts the best of students and faculty. Recruiters ranging from global investment banks to NGOs working with the poor harvest its graduates.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Vidyaviniyogaadvikasah
ShortDescription: IIM Ahmedabad is globally recognized for its excellence in management education.

Highlights.name: Student Counselling
Highlights.description: The Students' Personal and Career Development Centre is an on-campus counselling facility at the Indian Institute of Management, Ahmedabad. The Centre is committed to providing the Institute's students, faculty and staff members with a space for self exploration and addressing of psychological concerns, leading to personal, social and professional growth

Highlights.name: Hospitality & Utilities
Highlights.description: The IIMA knows how precious time is and has set up all facilities so that no one has to run around off campus to get simple jobs done. The campus has its own cafes, banks and ATMs, children's creche facility, all-purpose store, courier & laundry services et al.

Highlights.name: Sport Facilities
Highlights.description: A glistening swimming pool, Squash courts, Snooker room, indoor badminton courts and a number of board game options to spend some hours away from your notes

enhanced_description: IIM Ahmedabad, established in 1961, is a globally recognized, leading institution for management education in India. It has consistently maintained its leadership position, attracting top students and faculty. The institute offers various MBA courses and specialized programs, including those for armed forces. Its graduates are highly sought after by a wide range of recruiters, from global investment banks to NGOs, contributing to the development of a diverse and inclusive workforce.
competitive_advantages: Leadership in management education in India
